```{r}
#| out.width: "80%"

library(tidyverse)
read_csv("Data/Inflation_rate_in_Asia.csv")
inflatn_asia <- read_csv("Data/Inflation_rate_in_Asia.csv")

tidyinflatn_asia<- inflatn_asia %>%
  group_by(Subregion) %>%
  summarise(Average_inflation = mean(Inflation))

tidyinflatn_asia

ggplot(tidyinflatn_asia, aes(x = Year, y = Average_Inflation, colour = Subregion)) +
geom_point() +
geom_line(aes(group = Subregion))+ scale_colour_viridis_d()



```
